lead_paragraph: Mark Johnson, who scored two goals for the gold medal-winning United States team at the 1980 Olympics, was hired as the coach of the women's national team. Johnson coached the Wisconsin women's team to its first N.C.A.A. title last season.
snippet: Mark Johnson, who scored two goals for the gold medal-winning United States team at the 1980 Olympics, was hired as the coach of the women's national team. Johnson coached the Wisconsin women's team to its first N.C.A.A. title last season.
